item.description:
What could possibly happen in your life that would be so earth shattering that you
wake up and you are a different person? Things that bothered you are no longer
irritating, food tastes better and you have a whole new view on life. It can happen to
any of us. Please join us for a movie that addresses this life change. The Shift Starring
Wayne Dyer. After the movie there will be a discussion.

 

Payments can be made through Paypal or on the evening of the Meetup at the HSCCenter.
item.how_to_find_us: Murphy Drive is located off of Northeastern Blvd in Nashua, NH

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Movie & Discussion - Meaning to Ambition - "The Shift"
